titleStmt.title: The prophecy of Gnatus a Brittish prophet: introduced by a preface of Robert Ware, Esq; and set forth with a few notes by the introductor.
titleStmt.author: Gnatus.
Ware, Robert, d. 1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Ray at Colledge-Green, for Samuel Helsham bookseller, at the Colledge-Arms in Castle-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library (Dublin, Ireland).
